title: Affiliation Definition
description: Records of affiliations such as origins, religions, factions, guilds, or planar allegiances.

entry.description: Single affiliation keyed by its records entry name.

type.description: Affiliation category (e.g., origin, religion, faction, guild, cosmic).

tier.description: Influence or power tier (e.g., Mortal, Ascended, Transcendent).

leaders.description: Key figures or founders associated with this affiliation.

members.description: Notable characters belonging to this affiliation.

domains.description: Locations or realms controlled or influenced by the affiliation.

races.description: Species commonly aligned with this affiliation.

philosophy.description: Optional motto or guiding belief structure.

canon.description: Whether this affiliation entry asserts canon facts requiring provenance.
